title: Shen ultimate has an ap ratio
body: Shen ultimate shield  depends on ABILITY POWER , and it makes no sense because Shen do not build AP so i think it has to be removed and it should depends on how much bonus health Shen has.This would send Shen into the same tier as Aatrox , Rumble , Camille , Irelia , etc and he would become super strong, he might even become op.IF he does become op then his others ability should be slightly nerfed and THAT'S IT we got it , another strong champion.

Sorry but what? The shield is big enough and the point of the shield isn't the shield itself but the fact that Shen suddenly appears and joins the fight. So he bring an extra person to a fight. He can pressure a lane and when someone comes to contest he can join his team in whatever they are doing without the need of teleport. The map pressure is provides is the reason his ult is and will always be good, the shield isn't why you care about it.
